2520/A0/04/804/004.indicator_name: # and % of designanted basic emergency obstetric and new born care facilities that are operational 24/7
2520/A0/04/804/004.headline: There is progress made in achieving this result. The EmONC assessment carried out in 2015 has facilitated newborn care focused capacity building of government structures including pre service. About 40% of health facilities providing ANC are now open 24hrs to provide emergency obstetric and neonatal care services.

2520/A0/04/808/005.indicator_name: Number of governmental and non-governmental programs using the NISSA single registry
2520/A0/04/808/005.headline: A total of 120 000 households have been registered in National Information for Social Assistance (NISSA). Political commitment to use the National Information System for Social Assistance (NISSA) as a single registry for social assistance has been secured. Three Government safety net programmes in three CCs used NISSA for targeting beneficiaries.
